title: Machine learning the hard way -- a story about ponies
summary: Before you dive into a machine learning project, learn from the mistakes that I made while building a prediction engine for betting on horse races.  In this introductory talk, learn about common data science tasks like data munging, pre-processing, classification, regression, and interpreting results.
